title: not able to ID this font Please help
author: stargate

comments.content: Have you only had a look to [your previous request](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164945/http:/typophile.com/node/116886)? To me, Dick has already solved it...

I have sent the sample to the people you suggested and they told me it is Not one of there fonts. The said it was of roman style I searched the roman fonts and it it not there.  
This is a copy of the email  
I already received your mail.  
But our fonts are Thai fonts.  
And your sample is Roman characters.

Although, we have Roman characters in our fonts, but not quite the same as your sample.  
Very sorry for this.

Yes, all of their fonts had both Roman/Latin characters and Thai characters.

Did you ask specifically about PSL Isara? That information would have been helpful as they have published so many fonts over time.

If they say it's not one of theirs, that's the best that can be done. It may have been removed from their active inventory.

I am very sorry for this too. Dick Pape

How about this one: ArtBrush by Gary D Jessey. It's available at Dafont.  
 [http://www.dafont.com/search.php?text=SHOP&q=Artbrush](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164945/http:/www.dafont.com/search.php?text=SHOP&q=Artbrush)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317164945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/shop2_3512.jpg)
